article_title: Nigeria Bars Lufthansa, Air France Flights as Airspace Reopens
article_text: LISTEN TO ARTICLE    :49      SHARE THIS ARTICLE   Share   Tweet   Post   Email  {"contentId":"QG4J17T0G1KX01","position":"brokerboxarticle","dimensions":{"large_desktop":[[120,60]],"small_desktop":[[120,60]],"tablet":[[120,60]]},"strategy":"viewable","positionIncrement":1,"targeting":{"position":"brokerboxarticle1","url":"/news/articles/2020-09-04/nigeria-bars-lufthansa-air-france-flights-as-airspace-reopens"},"containerId":"brokerboxarticle-Xy5GYr4"}   Sign up to our Next Africa newsletter and follow Bloomberg Africa on Twitter    Nigeria barred flights by Lufthansa, Air France, KLM and Etihad Airways as its airspace reopens to international flights, saying it was in response to similar restrictions imposed on flights from the West African country.    {"contentId":"QG4J17T0G1KX01","position":"outstream","dimensions":{"large_desktop":[[1,8]],"small_desktop":[[1,8]],"tablet":[[1,8]]},"strategy":"always","type":"Outstream Video Native Ad","targeting":{"position":"outstream","url":"/news/articles/2020-09-04/nigeria-bars-lufthansa-air-france-flights-as-airspace-reopens"},"containerId":"outstream-video-1-QG4J17T0G1KX01"}   {"contentId":"QG4J17T0G1KX01","position":"outstream","dimensions":{"mobile":[[1,8]]},"strategy":"always","type":"Outstream Video Native Ad","targeting":{"position":"outstream","url":"/news/articles/2020-09-04/nigeria-bars-lufthansa-air-france-flights-as-airspace-reopens"},"containerId":"outstream-video-2-QG4J17T0G1KX01"}   Other airlines restricted from flying into Nigeria include RwandAir, Air Namibia, Royal Air Maroc and TAAG Angola, the Aviation Ministry said in a statement on Twitter.       Find below the lists of approved airlines to come to Abuja and Lagos airports from 5th September 2020https://t.co/JOHR5eU1Xi#AviationNG — Federal Ministry of Aviation, Nigeria (@fmaviationng) September 3, 2020   {"contentId":"QG4J17T0G1KX01","position":"box","dimensions":{"mobile":[[300,250],[3,3],[1,1],"fluid"]},"type":"Mobile Body Box Ad","positionIncrement":1,"targeting":{"position":"box1","positionIncrement":1,"url":"/news/articles/2020-09-04/nigeria-bars-lufthansa-air-france-flights-as-airspace-reopens"},"containerId":"box-vdz49Wd"}   Airlines approved to fly in Africa’s most-populous country include British Airways, Delta Air, Qatar Airways, Emirates Airline and Ethiopian Airlines. Flights are also permitted from Ghana, Ivory Coast, Egypt, Kenya, Lebanon and Turkey, according to the statement.     Published on ‎4‎ ‎September‎, ‎2020‎ ‎10‎:‎22        Have a confidential tip for our reporters? GET IN TOUCH    Before it's here, it's on the Bloomberg Terminal.
